contents.text: Welcome to Fabric Genomics, the East Bay leader in AI-driven genomic interpretation for clinical labs and hospital systems.
For sales and partnership opportunities, press '1'.
For clinical laboratory sales and demos, press '1'.
Please hold while we connect you to our clinical lab sales team.

navigationGoals: I need to schedule a demo of your genomic interpretation platform for our clinical lab.
I want to schedule a demo of your genomic interpretation platform for my clinical lab at the VA clinic.
I’d like to schedule a demo of your AI-driven genomic interpretation pipeline for our clinical lab.
I’d like to schedule a demo of your clinical genomics interpretation platform for our lab.
I’d like to schedule a hands-on demo of your genomic interpretation software for our university lab.

contents.text: For hospital system enterprise solutions, press '2'.
Please hold while we connect you to our hospital partnerships team.

navigationGoals: I want to explore an enterprise partnership package for our hospital system.
I'm calling from a VA hospital to discuss enterprise solutions for integrating genomic testing across our facilities.
I want to explore enterprise integration of your genomics platform with our hospital’s EHR system.
I need information about your enterprise genomic solutions for our hospital.
I need details on enterprise solutions for integrating your platform into a hospital system tied to my research group.

contents.text: For technical support and customer service, press '2'.
For software setup and integration assistance, press '1'.
Please hold while we connect you to our integration specialists.

navigationGoals: I need help setting up and integrating your software with our lab’s existing systems.
I need assistance setting up and integrating your software with our lab's existing systems.
I need help setting up your genomic analysis software and integrating it with our lab’s LIMS via API.
I need help integrating and setting up your software in our system.
I’m looking for guidance on setting up and integrating your software API within our lab’s data pipeline.

contents.text: For report interpretation and troubleshooting, press '2'.
Please hold while we connect you to our clinical support team.

navigationGoals: I have a report result that needs interpretation and troubleshooting.
I need help understanding and troubleshooting a genomic report I just received.
I need assistance troubleshooting unexpected annotation results in our clinical genomic reports.
I need assistance understanding and troubleshooting my genomic test report.
I need help interpreting a genomic analysis report I received and troubleshooting any issues.
